peaceful euphoria of being alone with Nature's beauty
serenity through solitude as a character trait

feel(ing of) enthusiastic anticipation/looking forward to / feel one can't wait for

feel(ing of being) upbeat / in a good mood
feel(ing of) being spirited, feeling "alive", feeling uplifted

feel(ing of being) beholden, wanting to give back
